item.title: Critter Farms DIY 660 Gallon Rain Barrel Manifold System
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OjsFnRvniPM (37) 10” Standard Concrete Block (hardware store) (1) TON Traffic Bond and gravel (local landscape supply) ACCESS TO STORED WATER: (2) Garden Hose Shut Off Ball Valve - Full Flow (hardware store) MANIFOLD SYSTEM: (12) 3⁄4” Bulkhead Fitting (hardware store) (12) 3⁄4” Female Tee PVC Schedule 40 (hardware store) (12) 3⁄4” x 2” Schedule 80 PVC Riser (hardware store) (3) 3⁄4” PVC ball valve slip x slip 10 ft. 3⁄4” schedule 40 PVC pipe (hardware store) 16 ft.
